xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 31 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 11:10 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 11:10 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 12:40 <sdumitriu1> Hangout in 20 minutes? 12:40 <bvancea> yup 12:40 <bvancea> everyone in the office? 12:41 <sdumitriu1> Yes 12:41 <bvancea> cool 13:02 <bvancea> go go go hangout 13:02 <bvancea> :D 13:02 <sdumitriu1> Calling 13:03 <bvancea> I didn't get a notification yet 13:44 <bvancea> sdumitriu: did you manage to take a look at the code I've comitted these last weeks? 13:49 <sdumitriu1> Not yet 13:50 <sdumitriu1> It's in the schedule 13:50 <bvancea> ah, ok 13:50 <bvancea> :) 13:50 <sdumitriu1> My impression was that it's pretty fast 13:54 <bvancea> well, ,my only concern are group by queries 13:54 <bvancea> solr only allows result grouping for single valued terms 13:54 <bvancea> so I implemented group by with facets/facet pivots 13:57 <sdumitriu1> I see 14:14 <sdumitriu1> bvancea: What distro are you using? 14:36 <Jim_> has joined #medsavant 14:37 <sdumitriu1> http://phenotips.org/downtime/medsavant-server-deb_1.1~20130731120544_all.deb 15:46 <Jim_> has joined #medsavant 17:02 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 17:03 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu, I had to run an errand which took longer than expected 17:03 <sdumitriu> No problem 17:03 <bvancea> I'm using ubuntu 12.10 and windows 7 17:04 <bvancea> did you finish a deb build? 17:04 <sdumitriu> No, I tested it on Jim_'s computer, I still have to work on it 17:05 <bvancea> I see 17:05 <bvancea> do you need an .exe for windows? 17:05 <bvancea> I'm curious how they install 17:08 <sdumitriu> Probably tomorrow
